text: Sibel Nohut (born January 7, 1984) is a Turkish women's football defender currently playing in the First League for Trabzon İdmanocağı with jersey number 17. She was a member of the Turkish national U-19 team. She is also performing on the stage as an actress in theatre plays at Akçaabat, Trabzon. ==Career== ===Club=== Sibel Nohut playing for Trabzon İdmanocağı in the 2014–15 season. She received her license for K.T.Ü. Spor of the Karadeniz Technical University on November 28, 2001, and played the 2001–02 season in the Turkish Women's League, the top level women's league. She capped 11 times for the university's team. In 2007, she was transferred by her hometown club Trabzonspor. However, she did not play at any matches. Starting with the 2010–11 season, Sibel Nohut is a member of Trabzon İdmanocağı. ===International=== In 2002, Nohut was admitted to the Turkey women's U-17 team to play at the 2003 UEFA Championship First qualifying round matches, and debuted in the game against Wales on October 4 that year.
